titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Desmodur RF-E.
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Desmodur RF-E.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2009, the duty on mixtures of tris(4-isocyanatophenyl) thiophosphate, ethyl acetate, and monochlorobenzene (Desmodur RF-E).
